cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.5)

if(MSVC)
    set(curl_LIBRARY ${toolchain_SOURCE_DIR}/third-party/curl/lib/libcurl.lib PARENT_SCOPE)
    set(curl_SOURCE_DIR ${toolchain_SOURCE_DIR}/third-party/curl/include PARENT_SCOPE)
else()
    find_package(CURL REQUIRED)
    set(curl_LIBRARY ${CURL_LIBRARY} PARENT_SCOPE)
    set(curl_SOURCE_DIR ${CURL_INCLUDE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
endif()
